skills.name: Maul
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Generate Spirit:</text> <text class='c_resource'>17</text></br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>30%</text></br>Shapeshift into a Werebear and maul enemies in front of you, dealing <text class='c_number'>[0.22 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage.

skills.name: Pulverize
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Spirit Cost:</text> <text class='c_resource'>35</text></br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>25%</text></br>Shapeshift into a Werebear and slam the ground, dealing <text class='c_number'>[0.5 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage to surrounding enemies.

skills.name: Debilitating Roar
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Cooldown: </text><text class='c_resource'>[22 * (cdr[sLevel]]</text> seconds</br>Shapeshift into a Werebear and bellow a mighty roar, reducing Nearby enemies' damage dealt by <text class='c_number'>70%</text> for <text class='c_number'>4</text> seconds.

skills.name: Earthen Bulwark
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Cooldown: </text><text class='c_resource'>16</text> seconds</br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>30%</text></br>Rocks surround you for <text class='c_number'>[(3 + [Affix_Value_2#legendary_druid_026])]</text> seconds, granting a <text class='c_important'><u>Barrier</u></text> that absorbs <text class='c_number'>[[0.45 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]*100]%</text> of your Base Life <text class='c_number'>([0.45 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))])</text> in damage.

skills.name: Grizzly Rage
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Cooldown: </text><text class='c_resource'>50</text> seconds</br>Shapeshift into ifMod.Upgrade1an <text class='c_important'><u>Unstoppable</u></text>elsea Dire Werebear for <text class='c_number'>[(10 * [1 + 0.25*sLevel]) + [Affix_Value_1#legendary_druid_104]]</text> seconds gaining <text class='c_number'>50000%</text> bonus damage and <text class='c_number'>50100%</text> Damage Reduction. Damage bonus is increased by <text class='c_number'>50500%</text> each second while in this form.</br></br>Kills extend the duration by <text class='c_number'>506</text> second up to <text class='c_number'>507</text> additional seconds.ifMod.DELETEME</br></br>Casting <text class='c_important'>Grizzly Rage</text> causes enemies in the area to take <text class='c_number'>0</text> damage and be Slowed by <text class='c_number'>50%</text> for <text class='c_number'>6</text> seconds.

skills.name: Trample
skills.desc: ifMod.Spirit<text class='c_label'>Generates Spirit:</text> <text class='c_resource'>40</text></br><text class='c_label'>Cooldown: </text><text class='c_resource'>14</text> seconds</br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>20%</text></br>Shapeshift into a Werebear, become <text class='c_important'><u>Unstoppable</u></text>, and charge forward, dealing <text class='c_number'>[0.75 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage and Knocking Back enemies.</br></br>Enemies who are Knocked Back into terrain take an additional <text class='c_number'>[0.45 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage and are Stunned for <text class='c_number'>3</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Chain
strikethrough_affixes: +(1) Rank of the Wild Impulses Passive
added_affixes: Your <text class='c_important'>Core</text> Skills deal up to <text class='c_random'>52.23% </text> increased damage based on your amount of <text class='c_important'><u>Fortify</u></text>.

equipment.name: Sovereign Helm
base_affixes: +0.02 Life Regeneration while Not Damaged Recently
strikethrough_affixes: When the <text class='c_important'>Nature's Fury</text> Key Passive triggers a free Skill, your non-<text class='c_important'>Ultimate</text> Cooldowns of the opposite type are reduced by <text class='c_random'>6.7</text> seconds.
added_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skills grant <text class='c_number'>30%</text> Damage Reduction for <text class='c_random'>8.62</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Primal Sabatons
added_affixes: Damage from <text class='c_important'>Earth</text> Skills Slow enemies hit by <text class='c_random'>54.65%</text> for <text class='c_number'>7.5</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Doom Cuisses
added_affixes: You gain <text class='c_random'>0.65%</text> increased Armor for <text class='c_number'>6</text> seconds when you deal any form of damage, stacking up to <text class='c_random'>38.77%</text>.

equipment.name: Doom Gauntlets
added_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Pulverize</text> is now also an <text class='c_important'>Earth</text> Skill. After casting <text class='c_important'>Pulverize</text>, tectonic spikes continue to deal <text class='c_random'>1.04</text> damage over <text class='c_number'>3</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Insatiable Fury
base_affixes: Werebear form is now your true form, and you gain <text class='c_number'>+3</text> Ranks to all <text class='c_important'>Werebear</text> Skills.
+9.88% Total Armor while in Werebear Form

equipment.name: Ring
added_affixes: The duration of <text class='c_important'>Grizzly Rage</text> is increased by <text class='c_random'>5.5</text> seconds. In addition, Critical Strikes while <text class='c_important'>Grizzly Rage</text> is active increase your Critical Strike Damage by <text class='c_number'>15%</text> for the duration.
+18% Critical Strike Damage with Earth Skills

equipment.name: Primordial Fetish
base_affixes: 10.31% Damage Reduction from Enemies That Are Poisoned
strikethrough_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Trample</text> now summons <text class='c_number'>9</text> <text class='c_important'>Landslide</text> pillars of earth during its duration that deal <text class='c_random'>106.58%</text> normal damage. <text class='c_important'>Trample</text> is now also a <text class='c_important'>Nature Magic</text> and <text class='c_important'>Earth</text> Skill.
added_affixes: Attacking enemies with a <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skill increases the damage of your next <text class='c_important'>Core</text> Skill cast by <text class='c_random'>12.3%</text>, up to <text class='c_number'>45%</text>.

equipment.name: Octopian Edge
strikethrough_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Trample</text> now summons <text class='c_number'>9</text> <text class='c_important'>Landslide</text> pillars of earth during its duration that deal <text class='c_random'>117.75%</text> normal damage. <text class='c_important'>Trample</text> is now also a <text class='c_important'>Nature Magic</text> and <text class='c_important'>Earth</text> Skill.
added_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Pulverize</text> creates a shockwave that travels forward, dealing <text class='c_random'>144.62%</text> of its damage to targets in the path.

equipment.name: Circle
base_affixes: +13.5% Critical Strike Damage with Earth Skills
strikethrough_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Landslide's</text> earth pillars each strike a second time and deal an additional <text class='c_random'>13.63%</text> bonus damage per hit.
added_affixes: Restore <text class='c_random'>4.5</text> of your Primary Resource when you Crowd Control an enemy.
